activities.heading: Games & Entertainment
activities.summary: Sports impact our culture,other sources of entertainment and our economy.They help in physical and mental growth and also contribute to the formation of character generally.

activities.heading: Art & Creativity
activities.summary: Art is the expression or application of human creative skill and imagination, typically in a visual form such as painting or sculpture, producing works to be appreciated primarily for their beauty or emotional power.
